1.0.1.en: Added support for ZigBee and Z-Wave devices, and improved the remote control triggers.

2.0.0.en: 1) Support Homey V5.0.0. 2) Support all namron devices. 3) Optimized the support for Flow, especially Remote. 4) If the previous devices are not working properly, please add them again.

2.1.0.en: Added state report for ZigBee Light, added alarm_contact for Door Sensor, added meter_power and measure_power for 4512724, made some performance improvements.

2.1.1.en: Fixed the problem of 4512715 not working.

2.1.4.en: Fix the issue that doesn't work with older devices.

2.1.10.en: Fixes an issue that some devices do not recognize.

2.1.13.en: Add support for the latest remote firmware.

2.1.15.en: Add the support for the thermostat mode to 4512725.

2.1.16.en: Add the support for the thermostat mode to 4512725.

2.2.1.en: Make the flow clear and concise, change the Zwave device to unsecure.

2.2.2.en: Add support for 4512744, 4512745, 4512746; Bug fixes and improvements.

2.2.3.en: Fixes an issue that some Z-Wave devices pairing failed.

2.2.11.en: Add support for the ZigBee thermostat, bug fixes.

2.2.13.en: Add support for the Homey Cloud.

2.2.25.en: Added support for 4512739 CCT Light Controller.

2.2.27.en: Fixed an issue that caused the level not to update.

2.2.32.en: Add support for the ZigBee thermostat.

2.2.34.en: Added support for new devices, added Cloud support to 4512737

2.2.35.en: Added support for Namron Stove Guard

2.2.36.en: Added support for Namron Stove Guard

2.2.37.en: Added support for TypeScript drivers, updated Stove Guard Support

2.2.38.en: Update Stove Guard Driver to use only one Zigbee Endpoint

2.2.39.en: Added support for new devices. Panel heaters, Stove Guard, Zigbee Thermostat plug and zigbee/z-wave window coverong controls

2.2.50.en: Added new Namron Devices - New dimmers and thermostat

2.2.52.en: Added new Dimmer Device - 4512750/51 - Namron LED Dimmer 2.0

2.2.53.en: Added new Dimmer Device - 4512750/51 - Namron LED Dimmer 2.0, Fixed some device images.

2.2.54.en: Updated device class from light to socket on relay devices to give some more options. Added test to fix kWh reporting on 1402756.

2.2.55.en: Updated device class on relay devices from light to socket to give some more options. Added a test to fix kWh reporting on 1402756.

2.2.56.en: Included all Zigbee Panelheaters models into 1 device for easier adding. Put old panelheater devices as deprecated. Updated device class to socket on relay devices so they get some more out of the box Homey automations. Added fix on 1402756 on kWh reporting.

2.2.57.en: Added driver for 4512734 - Namron Z-Wave MultiSensor.

2.2.58.en: Added correct Manufactor ID on 3308431 - Luna lamp, Some name corrections on devices.

2.2.60.en: 4512757 - Namron Z-Wave Termostat - fix for power measure bug
